Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: We had a great night here! Great atmosphere, very busy, good mix of tunes on the dance floor. Seems as though a lot of locals come here at night. Only downside was it closed at 3am.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Nice place to seat and have a drink while exploring Albert Kuypt market. Food is also available. Prices are a bit higher, while service is terrible. We've been waiting for a waitress 20-30 minutes and when she arrived, she wasn't as polite â€¦

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Looks good but staff is VERY unfriendly. There are lots of other bars around. Better chose one of them.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Nice atmosphere with quick service even when it is crowded. Prices are good and beer is always good.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text:
Popular with the locals, I rarely heard my open language.  13.50 for a hearty cocked saute, small missed salad and fries with whatever sauce you prefer.
Great price, lovely atmosphere (I can't for the football game) and it was recommended by a Dutch local gal.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Nice place just in the middle of the market. The stuff is very friendly and the food is really good. The pic is tuna sandwich and green tea delicious!

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Great food. Very friendly staff. Willing to do something for you to make your experience special. And yes you will come back there.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Nice friendly atmosphere. Creative fusion Dutch dishes. In the middle of the picturesque Albert Cup market in Amsterdam.   About 15 minutes walk From The Museum plan.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: The waiters and waitresses are the rudest people we have ever come across. We did absolutely nothing wrong nor make any difficult requests yet from arrival til departure the staff had extremely bad attitudes, we have never felt so unwelcome â€¦

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Nice staff. Excellent views. Nice coffee

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: This seems to be a popular place for drinks and a good evening but certainly wouldnâ€™t advise you to go here if you are looking for a satisfying meal. The most oily, poorly made burgers Iâ€™ve ever had, which we received after a wait of 40 minutes! I rarely leave a bad review but this one truly disappointed me.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Nice restaurant. Service is good.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: A slightly strange smell permeated the air, but this may be because they just cleaned. It's right next to the Albert Cyup market. Good burgers, good breakfasts, and GREAT chips. The waitress was very friendly and helpful.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: I came to this bar with my colleague Matthew Holden in a mission to find our friend Louisa a mate. The bar was very busy but the bar staff were efficient and the music excellent. They played a healthy amount of ABBA and some awful remixes of Beatles songs. I would go back.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text:
Beers, coffee (vegan alternatives), smoothies...and food. Nice cute terrace in the sun, right next to the market.
Slightly overpriced but probably the case of the whole area. Service friendliness could be improved.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: One of the coolest eateries at De Pijp. It was a sunny day and I sat outside for a beer and ended up ordering a Quiche. This quiche was amazing - very very delicious. The service was fast and people are very polite. The place has a great vibe!

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: We came for a quick lunch before our flight back home. My wife ordered a Caesars salad without croutons - since she is a celiac she has allergy to gluten. Salad came with croutons, so we returned it and asked for the new one without bread. â€¦

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
Review Text: Cozy but nice. Good place to go with friends. Large TV, so if it's a day with a good match somewhere, you get to enjoy that. A small duplex area and a small bar. Typical Amsterdam bar.

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder

Name: cafâˆšÂ© de Groene Vlinder
